name: gulp-umbrella
description: Used to add umbrella data to the fileobject for use in plugins like jade.

scripts.release: (git pull origin master) && (npm version patch && git checkout release && git merge master && git checkout master) && npm run push
scripts.update: (git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm install)

author: Smart Coordination GmbH <office@umbrella.zone> (https://umbrella.zone)
